mapper.select:
select count(p.product_seq) from product p join category c using (category_seq)
p.product_grade != 'F'
and (p.product_name like concat('%', #{searchKeyWord}, '%') or c.category_name like concat('%', #{searchKeyWord}, '%'))

select r.review_seq, s.sub_seq, c.cust_id, p.product_seq, p.product_serial, p.product_name, r.review_content, r.review_rate, r.review_date from review r join subscribe s on r.sub_seq = s.sub_seq join product p on s.product_seq = p.product_seq join customer c on s.cust_seq = c.cust_seq
select cust_id, cust_name, cust_email, cust_phone from customer where cust_status = true

select p.product_img, p.product_serial, p.category_seq, c.cust_name, s.sub_date, s.sub_card, s.sub_total, s.sub_period from subscribe s join customer c on s.cust_seq = c.cust_seq join product p on s.product_seq = p.product_seq;
mapper.insert: insert into product ( product_seq, category_seq, product_serial, product_name, product_img, product_detail, product_pay, product_brand, product_grade, product_date, product_height, product_weight, product_wh, product_color, product_features ) values ( nextval('product_seq'), #{category_seq}, #{product_serial}, #{product_name}, #{product_img}, #{product_detail}, #{product_pay}, #{product_brand}, #{product_grade}, #{product_date}, #{product_height}, #{product_weight}, #{product_wh}, #{product_color}, #{product_features} )
